description.value:
Frequency once per day

You have been granted a sliver of the power of the yamaraj, the magistrates of the dead who agreed to allow duskwalkers to exist at all. You exhale a blast of icy wind and ravenous insects. This is a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] that deals @Damage[14d6[slashing]] damage and @Damage[4d6[persistent,slashing]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save using your class or spell DC, whichever is higher). On a critical failure, targets also become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.
